snippet: Saul Perlmutter, a Berkeley physics professor, must have been thrilled to receive a Nobel Prize, but some say the best part of the award is the free reserved lifetime campus parking space.
lead_paragraph: Saul Perlmutter, a Berkeley physics professor, must have been thrilled to receive a Nobel Prize, but some say the best part of the award is the free reserved lifetime campus parking space.

headline.main: Universe Is Expanding, but Where Do I Park?
headline.print_headline: Universe Is Expanding, But Where Do I Park?
